parameters.name: Eyes
parameters.description: Shape and positioning of eyes that significantly impact facial expression and character

options.name: Almond
options.visual: Elongated oval shape with subtle tapering at corners.
options.as_seen_in: Classic beauty standards, balanced elegant eyes.

options.name: Round
options.visual: Circular shape with open appearance and minimal corner angles.
options.as_seen_in: Youthful feminine features, certain anime-inspired looks.

options.name: Hooded
options.visual: Partially covered by upper eyelid creating depth.
options.as_seen_in: Mature faces, certain ethnic characteristics.

options.name: Monolid
options.visual: Smooth upper eyelid without visible crease.
options.as_seen_in: East Asian features, certain global populations.

options.name: Cat-Eyes
options.visual: Distinctly upward angle at outer corners.
options.as_seen_in: Dramatic looks, editorial fashion.

options.name: Deep-Set
options.visual: Positioned beneath prominent brow ridge creating shadow.
options.as_seen_in: Strong masculine features, intense expressions.

options.name: Narrow
options.visual: Horizontally compressed with subtle opening.
options.as_seen_in: Strong expressions, focused appearances.

size.name: None (default)
size.visual: Standard size of eyes relative to face.

size.name: Small
size.visual: Reduced size of eyes relative to face.

size.name: Medium
size.visual: Balanced size of eyes relative to face.

size.name: Large
size.visual: Increased size of eyes relative to face.

shape_intensity.name: None (default)
shape_intensity.visual: Standard expression of eye shape characteristics.

shape_intensity.name: Slightly
shape_intensity.visual: Subtle expression of eye shape characteristics.

shape_intensity.name: Distinctly
shape_intensity.visual: Clear expression of eye shape characteristics.

shape_intensity.name: Extremely
shape_intensity.visual: Maximum expression of eye shape characteristics.

angle.name: Slightly downturned
angle.visual: Subtle downward tilt of outer corners.

angle.name: Moderately downturned
angle.visual: Noticeable downward tilt of outer corners.

angle.name: Distinctly downturned
angle.visual: Significant downward tilt of outer corners.

angle.name: Slightly upturned
angle.visual: Subtle upward tilt of outer corners.

angle.name: Moderately upturned
angle.visual: Noticeable upward tilt of outer corners.

angle.name: Distinctly upturned
angle.visual: Significant upward tilt of outer corners.

parameters.name: Eye Color
parameters.description: Color of the iris that contributes to facial impact and character distinctiveness

options.name: Brown
options.visual: Range from light amber to deep chocolate tones.
options.as_seen_in: Most common global eye color, approximately 70-80% of population.

options.name: Blue
options.visual: Range from pale ice blue to deep navy tones.
options.as_seen_in: Approximately 8-10% of global population, more common in European heritage.

options.name: Green
options.visual: Range from pale sage to deep emerald tones.
options.as_seen_in: Rarest natural eye color, approximately 2% of global population.

options.name: Hazel
options.visual: Multi-tonal blend of brown and green with gold flecks.
options.as_seen_in: Approximately 5-8% of global population, varies with lighting conditions.

options.name: Grey
options.visual: Range from light silver to deep slate tones.
options.as_seen_in: Approximately 3% of global population, often appears blue-tinged.

intensity.name: None (default)
intensity.as_seen_in: Typical expression of the selected color.

intensity.name: Pale
intensity.as_seen_in: Subtle expression of the selected color.

intensity.name: Medium
intensity.as_seen_in: Average expression of the selected color.

intensity.name: Deep
intensity.as_seen_in: Vibrant expression of the selected color.

parameters.name: Eyebrows
parameters.description: Facial features that frame the eyes and significantly impact expression

options.name: Arched
options.visual: Curved upward with highest point above outer third of eye.
options.as_seen_in: Classic feminine beauty standards, elegant expressions.

options.name: Straight
options.visual: Minimal curve following horizontal line above eyes.
options.as_seen_in: Modern minimalist looks, certain East Asian features.

options.name: Rounded
options.visual: Gentle curve with soft angles throughout.
options.as_seen_in: Youthful feminine appearances, approachable expressions.

options.name: S-shaped
options.visual: Complex curve with multiple directional changes.
options.as_seen_in: Distinctive fashionable looks, unique facial features.

options.name: Soft-angled
options.visual: Subtle angle with gentle transitions between segments.
options.as_seen_in: Balanced feminine features, natural elegant appearances.

options.name: Flat
options.visual: Low-arch horizontal shape with subtle definition.
options.as_seen_in: Understated masculine features, certain ethnic characteristics.

options.name: Angular
options.visual: Distinct change of direction creating visible corner.
options.as_seen_in: Striking masculine features, defined expressions.

options.name: Slightly Arched
options.visual: Subtle upward curve with minimal height.
options.as_seen_in: Balanced masculine features, approachable expressions.

options.name: Natural Line
options.visual: Following orbital bone with modest definition.
options.as_seen_in: Classic masculine faces, natural appearances.

shape_aesthetic.name: None (default)
shape_aesthetic.visual: Standard aesthetic quality of eyebrow shape.
shape_aesthetic.as_seen_in: Typical expression of the selected shape.

position.name: High-set
position.visual: Positioned with increased space above eyes.

position.name: Low-set
position.visual: Positioned with minimal space above eyes.

styling.name: Tapered
styling.visual: Gradually narrowing from inner to outer edges.

styling.name: Feathered
styling.visual: Individual hairs visible creating textured appearance.

styling.name: Groomed
styling.visual: Clearly defined shape with precise edges.

styling.name: Asymmetric
styling.visual: Intentional or natural variation between sides.
styling.as_seen_in: Different shapes between left and right eyebrows.

parameters.name: Nose
parameters.description: Central facial feature that significantly influences profile and frontal appearance

options.name: Straight
options.visual: Even bridge line without curves or angles.
options.as_seen_in: Classical profiles, balanced facial features.

options.name: Button
options.visual: Small rounded shape with slightly upturned tip.
options.as_seen_in: Youthful feminine appearances, certain idealized features.

options.name: Celestial
options.visual: Gently curved bridge with upturned tip.
options.as_seen_in: Delicate feminine profiles, softer facial features.

options.name: Roman
options.visual: Convex curve with refined proportions.
options.as_seen_in: Classical profiles, certain Mediterranean features.

options.name: Nubian
options.visual: Low bridge with wider nostrils and distinct definition.
options.as_seen_in: Certain African and Middle Eastern features.

options.name: Greek
options.visual: Straight bridge continuing line of forehead.
options.as_seen_in: Classical beauty standards, sculptural profiles.

options.name: Aquiline
options.visual: Prominent convex curve creating "eagle-like" appearance.
options.as_seen_in: Strong masculine profiles, certain Mediterranean features.

options.name: Hawk
options.visual: Pronounced convex curve with sharp downward angle at tip.
options.as_seen_in: Powerful masculine features, distinctive profiles.

options.name: Bulbous
options.visual: Enlarged rounded tip with unique character.
options.as_seen_in: Distinctive masculine features, mature appearances.

options.name: Snub
options.visual: Short with slightly upturned tip.
options.as_seen_in: Certain facial structures, approachable features.

nose_bridge.name: Narrow-bridge
nose_bridge.visual: Thin upper portion connecting to forehead.

nose_bridge.name: Wide-base
nose_bridge.visual: Broader lower portion where nostrils connect.

nostril.name: Flared-nostrils
nostril.visual: Expanded nostril width creating broader appearance.

nostril.name: Narrow-nostrils
nostril.visual: Compressed nostril width creating slender appearance.

nose_tip.name: Rounded-tip
nose_tip.visual: Soft curved endpoint without angular features.

nose_tip.name: Pointed-tip
nose_tip.visual: More defined endpoint with angular quality.

nose_tip.name: Upturned
nose_tip.visual: Tip angled upward from the base.

nose_character.name: Asymmetric
nose_character.visual: Natural variation between sides creating unique character.

nose_character.name: Deviated-septum
nose_character.visual: Visible shift of center line creating distinctive appearance.

parameters.name: Mouth and Lips
parameters.description: Combined facial features defining the oral region that significantly impact expression, speech, and character appearance

options.name: Petite Bow
options.visual: Small, delicately shaped mouth with defined cupid's bow and medium fullness.
options.as_seen_in: Classical feminine beauty standards, elegant facial features.

options.name: Full Rounded
options.visual: Medium-sized mouth with plump, rounded lips and soft contours.
options.as_seen_in: Contemporary feminine beauty standards, youthful appearances.

options.name: Wide Expressive
options.visual: Horizontally extended mouth with defined edges and moderate fullness.
options.as_seen_in: Distinctive feminine features, expressive faces, certain ethnicities.

options.name: Thin Refined
options.visual: Precisely defined mouth with minimal vertical height and subtle definition.
options.as_seen_in: Certain elegant feminine features, mature or aristocratic appearances.

options.name: Upturned Cherub
options.visual: Mouth with naturally lifted corners and softly rounded lips.
options.as_seen_in: Friendly feminine expressions, cheerful youthful appearances.

options.name: Heart Shaped
options.visual: Pronounced cupid's bow with fuller center of upper lip tapering to corners.
options.as_seen_in: Romantic feminine ideals, stylized beauty standards.

options.name: Balanced Defined
options.visual: Medium-sized mouth with clear contours and moderate thickness.
options.as_seen_in: Typical masculine facial proportions, balanced features.

options.name: Bold Pronounced
options.visual: Substantial size with distinct edges and strong presence.
options.as_seen_in: Expressive masculine features, character actors.

options.name: Wide Firm
options.visual: Horizontally extended with well-defined borders and minimal fullness.
options.as_seen_in: Distinctive masculine features, determined expressions.

options.name: Thin Straight
options.visual: Minimal vertical height with precise linear appearance.
options.as_seen_in: Certain masculine archetypes, reserved or stern expressions.

options.name: Strong Contoured
options.visual: Clearly defined borders with sculptural definition and moderate fullness.
options.as_seen_in: Classical masculine ideals, heroic character types.

options.name: Full Natural
options.visual: Moderately full lips with softer definition and balanced proportions.
options.as_seen_in: Modern masculine beauty standards, approachable appearances.

options.name: Distinguished Angular
options.visual: Sharp definition with distinct corners and character lines.
options.as_seen_in: Mature masculine features, distinctive profiles.

options.name: Asymmetric Natural
options.visual: Subtle natural variation in lip fullness with unique character.
options.as_seen_in: Realistic faces, distinctive natural beauty.

expression.name: Pleasant
expression.visual: Slightly upturned corners with relaxed appearance.

detail.name: Full Upper Lip
detail.visual: More prominence in the top lip relative to lower.

detail.name: Full Lower Lip
detail.visual: More prominence in the bottom lip relative to upper.

detail.name: Defined Philtrum
detail.visual: Distinct vertical groove between nose and upper lip.

detail.name: Upturned Corners
detail.visual: Mouth edges that naturally angle upward.

detail.name: Downturned Corners
detail.visual: Mouth edges that naturally angle downward.

detail.name: Defined Vermillion Border
detail.visual: Clear, sharp edge between lips and surrounding skin.

parameters.name: Facial Hair
parameters.description: Presence and style of hair growth on the face

options.name: Clean Shaven
options.visual: No visible facial hair, smooth skin appearance.
options.as_seen_in: Many professional environments, certain cultural preferences.

options.name: Light Stubble
options.visual: Short, even growth showing hair follicles without significant length.
options.as_seen_in: "Five o'clock shadow," early beard growth.

options.name: Heavy Stubble
options.visual: Prominent short facial hair creating textured appearance.
options.as_seen_in: "Designer stubble," 3-7 days of growth.

options.name: Mustache
options.visual: Hair growth specifically above the upper lip.
options.as_seen_in: Various styles from thin to full.

options.name: Goatee
options.visual: Hair on chin and mustache with shaved cheeks.
options.as_seen_in: Contemporary professional environments, artistic communities.

options.name: Short Beard
options.visual: Full facial hair kept trimmed close to the face.
options.as_seen_in: Modern professional settings, contemporary fashion.

options.name: Full Beard
options.visual: Complete facial hair coverage with moderate length.
options.as_seen_in: Traditional styles, contemporary fashion trends.

options.name: Long Beard
options.visual: Extended facial hair growth past the chin.
options.as_seen_in: Certain religious traditions, specific subcultures.

density.name: Dense
density.visual: High density with minimal skin visibility.

grooming.name: Well-groomed
grooming.visual: Clean and maintained but less precise.

grooming.name: Slightly unkempt
grooming.visual: Minimal maintenance with natural growth patterns.
